name: Unreal Tournament 2017 Map - Razik Arena
description:
Death match map made for unreal tournament using unreal assets.

Inspired from the maps - Facing worlds (Unreal Tournament) and The Longest Yard (Quake)

Map Brief: Built by the subjugated Nali near their planet Na Pali. The Skaarj built this shrine as a gift to their Queen. This was a symbolic gesture to the Queen reinforcing the race's superiority and was one of the first steps to reach their ultimate goal - Conquering the World.
